_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Dynamica
author: sebastian.pietschner@gmail.com
startup: yarn deploy && yarn prisma migrate deploy && yarn start

installation.script:
apt-get update
apt-get install openssl git -y -qq
cd \/mnt\/server
if [[ -d .git\/ ]]; then
    git pull
else
    git clone https:\/\/github.com\/sebasptsch\/dynamica.git .;
fi;
yarn install --frozen-lockfile

variables.name: Database Path
variables.description: The path in which to create the sqlite database.

variables.name: Token
variables.description: The token for the discord bot.

variables.name: Client ID
variables.description: The client ID of your discord bot.
